AC Cleaning

AC water cleaning offers detailed cleaning of the indoor and outdoor units with a water pressure pump Machine including minor problem-fixing (excluding materials and parts). The service charge varies on your AC amount, height, weight, and difficulties

Building
Gas Filling

This service offers a performance checkup and post gas refill. If there is a leakage, most of the time AC can be fixed onsite but sometimes it might take a longer time. For that, you have to wait for 1 or 2 days.

Annual Maintance Package

Regular maintenance is essential for the optimal performance of your AC system. Our annual maintenance packages include comprehensive system inspection, cleaning and sanitizing of coils and filters, checking and topping up refrigerant levels, inspecting electrical components and connections, and performance testing
